title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
OB: No results are displayed when searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display the search results.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Right-click and choose 'Search' from the context menu.
4. In the search dialog, enter a declaration to search for.
5. Click the search button.
6. Note that no results are displayed.
